articles.title: 'I’m Going Back Out': Jake Knapp Wills His Way Into UNC Postseason History
articles.description: The ace delivers the longest NCAA tourney start for a Tar Heel in over a decade—and the kind of gritty, emotional performance that has defined his final season.
articles.content:
CHAPEL HILL, N.C. --- Jake Knapp has heard so many "before injury" and "the first since" that he's probably sick and tired of them. But after 8 ⅓ shutout innings against Holy Cross on Friday, he got one he hadn't heard before.

articles.title: Evan Phillips To Undergo Tommy John Surgery
articles.description: Dodgers star reliever Evan Phillips is headed for a major surgery. Find out more about the L.A. bullpen at MLB Trade Rumors.
articles.content:
Dodgers reliever Evan Phillips will undergo Tommy John surgery, manager Dave Roberts told reporters (including Fabian Ardaya of The Athletic). He’ll miss the remainder of this season and most or all of 2026 as well.
